name: terrahub
description: TerraHub is a terraform centric devops tool that simplifies provisioning and management of large amount of cloud resources and cloud services across multiple cloud accounts. For example: Serverless on Amazon AWS, or Kubernetes on Google Cloud, or VMs on Microsoft Azure.

commands.name: apply
commands.description: run `terraform apply` across multiple terraform scripts

options.name: var
options.description: Variable(s) to be used by terraform

options.name: var-file
options.description: Variable file(s) to be used by terraform

commands.name: component
commands.description: include existing terraform folder into current project

commands.name: create
commands.description: create terraform code from predefined templates

options.name: template
options.description: Template name (e.g. cloudfront, dynamodb, lambda, s3)

options.name: directory
options.description: Path where template should be created (default: .terrahub)

commands.name: destroy
commands.description: run `terraform destroy` across multiple terraform scripts

options.name: var
options.description: Variable(s) to be used by terraform

options.name: var-file
options.description: Variable file(s) to be used by terraform

commands.name: graph
commands.description: show the graph of dependencies between terrahub components

commands.name: init
commands.description: run `terraform init` across multiple terraform scripts

options.name: var
options.description: Variable(s) to be used by terraform

options.name: var-file
options.description: Variable file(s) to be used by terraform

commands.name: list
commands.description: list projects > cloud accounts > regions > services > resources

options.name: depth
options.description: Listing depth (0 - projects, 1 - accounts, 2 - regions, 3 - services, 4 - resources)

commands.name: plan
commands.description: run `terraform plan` across multiple terraform scripts

options.name: var
options.description: Variable(s) to be used by terraform

options.name: var-file
options.description: Variable file(s) to be used by terraform

commands.name: project
commands.description: create or update project that manages multiple terraform scripts

options.name: directory
options.description: Path where project should be created (default: cwd)

commands.name: run
commands.description: run automated workflow terraform init > workspace > plan > apply > destroy

options.name: apply
options.description: Enable apply command as part of automated workflow

options.name: destroy
options.description: Enable destroy command as part of automated workflow

options.name: var
options.description: Variable(s) to be used by terraform

options.name: var-file
options.description: Variable file(s) to be used by terraform

commands.name: workspace
commands.description: run `terraform workspace` across multiple terraform scripts

options.name: var
options.description: Variable(s) to be used by terraform

options.name: var-file
options.description: Variable file(s) to be used by terraform
